creator: peter.hancock@gmail.com
text:
XGC @1365650 now includes the option to configure the RowsPerStrip Tiff Tag (see https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50657)

This should be configurable in FOP

creator: peter.hancock@gmail.com
text: Configuration change with updated XGC jar committed in rev 1384310
